title: mlnx_direct removal

comments.content: mlnx_direct vif type is not used since Juno release.

comments.content:
this bug the track the work for removal of mlnx_driect in all the related projects 
nova, neutron and networking-mlnx

commit 3488559abaaffe28b0831689288938261a458adc
Author: Moshe Levi <email address hidden>
Date:   Sat May 9 18:53:59 2015 +0300

    mlnx MD: mlnx_direct removal
    
    mlnx_direct is deprecated from Juno release. sriov-nic-switch
    with macvtap port is the replacement for it.
    This patch removes the mlnx_direct from mlnx MD and
    from the supported vif_types.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1453410
    
    Change-Id: I7ee528dc04cdafa27455d5f8fd18c04c858466d8
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit 54b1af686dcd6c4b998b52fa9a7e439d6f9f3e69
Author: Moshe Levi <email address hidden>
Date:   Sat May 9 18:44:07 2015 +0300

    libvirt: mlnx_direct vif type removal
    
    The mlnx_direct vif_type is deprecated from Juno release. sriov-nic-switch
    vif_type with macvtap vnic_type it the replacement for mlnx_direct.
    This patch removes the mlnx_direct vif_type related code.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1453410
    
    Change-Id: I0f63e8eeb19de7bbcf817d27181b75946101430b
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
